TopicTitle: Top Gun AI - The Official Tournament Thread

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 11 minutes ago, Triop said:
> 
> 
> I only did BDA simulations, having both settings equalized as default, with exception of firing interval setting to 1.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Your F-2 does better here.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> How is my F-17 holding up there ? ![:lol:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_laugh.png ":lol:") is it any good ?
> 

That might explain some things. To prevent stalling and overturning, the turn factor is set at 10 and turn power set at 0.6, where the F-3 is able to support turn factor 20 and turn power 1. 

I've not tested against the new F-17 yet, I'll post when I do.

The good thing about the Cobra is that it's so unstable and flippy it becomes a very difficult target to shoot. The bad thing, I shot it down.

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/PLS0N/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

"oh shet what did i do"

-Bob Kerman

Link for the new F-2 variant, the BA Obr. 16. Keep the sensitivity at 7.5 and force at around 12-13, it flies best that way. I found out that most other configurations just make it turn so much it stalls.

It starts feeling like the most epic game of correspondance chess now, those chess games where you mail your moves to your opponent.

https://www.mediafire.com/?1ebpyby1w7hxucv

You got it, that is the real "Top Gun".

Build fighters, share knowledge, create the ultimate, and making Kerbin the greatest planet in the universe !

File in the previous post, it's the BA Obr.16M2. I only changed the altitude settings to 1000 and 2000 meters, to simulate tournament conditions. I've changed nothing else, and managed to shoot it down with the 16M2. The new version has 2xM230s and 1xVulcan instead of 2xVulcan. The turn force was also cranked up to 17.

Sorry, but your F-2BA Predator Obr. 16M2 didn't even have a chance to shoot, your fire interval is set to 12, and your visual range is not set to full.

I fixed that on the F-2BA Predator Obr. 16M2, it did fire but no hits.

I have no jet yet that can take on the Q-22 BD (from myself, and other peoples fighters)

Even [@drtricky](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/154647-drtricky/) FAB-41 Taurus (10 engine beast) can not beat it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

I'm going to let the Predator fight your original F-2B to see what is going on. . .
